data.title: DWR takes actions to support State’s future water supply strategy
data.excerpt: The Department of Water Resources announced new steps that, if approved, could save enough water to supply 4.7 million Californians annually while making conservation more affordable through financial assistance and tax exemptions.
data.author: Anna Opalka
